name: CubeStacles(mac)
description:
Avoid The Obstacles!  Play in full-screen. The levels work in a system where 1-10 is easy and every ten levels the base difficulty increases. The secondary difficulty ranges from easy - impossible. Here is an example of how the levels work:

1.1 - Base difficulty is beginner, secondary difficulty is beginner

2.5 - Base difficulty is amateur, secondary difficulty is intermediate

Welcome to update 0.2!

Whats new:

-Save Menu

-New Levels 6-10

-Bug Fixes
